result.title: Session [19 / 5 / 2018]
result.content:
Hello Everyone,

We've discussed all problems of PSUT Coding Marathon during the session except problem I. Please try to implement all of them and check the tutorial if you needed anything, here is the tutorial: http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/59545

We also talked about Sparse Table Data Structure. Here's our implementation: https://ideone.com/37qeGx

Problems that can be solved using a sparse table:

Range Minimum Query

Catapult that ball

CGCDSSQ

References:

TopCoder Tutorial â€” Sparse Table: https://www.topcoder.com/community/data-science/data-science-tutorials/range-minimum-query-and-lowest-common-ancestor/#Sparse_Table_(ST)_algorithm

Good luck!
